original_text: And all the evil of the men of Shechem did God render upon their heads: and upon them came the curse of Jotham the son of Jerubbaal.
korean_text: 또 세겜 사람들의 모든 악행을 하나님이 그들의 머리에 갚으셨으니 여룹바알의 아들 요담의 저주가 그들에게 응하니라

sentences.original_text: And all the evil of the men of Shechem
did God render upon their heads:
and upon them came the curse of Jotham
